duck: Convergent (continued fraction) - A convergent is one of a sequence of values obtained by evaluating successive truncations of a continued fraction.
Convergent series - In mathematics, a series is the sum of the terms of a sequence of numbers.
convergent definition: tending to move toward one point or to approach each other.

wiki.text:
'Convergent' means something that converges. It is commonly used in mathematics.


* Convergent (continued fraction)
* Convergent series
